name: unwarlike
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not often involved in or eager to start wars: The ancient Greeks were a most unwarlike people. The prince was a timid and unwarlike youth. Opposite
warlike
More examplesFewer examplesAll of the people that we encountered appeared to be friendly and quite unwarlike.Like many other unwarlike men, he was appalled by the noise and squalor of the trenches.Akhenaten proved to be an unwarlike ruler who devoted most of his time and energy to religion.The islanders had become accustomed to living in unwarlike isolation.
